description:
Learn Piano with Rosa - Rosa's Piano Online School - Teaching 32 Courses!

OVER 10,000 Successful students have already taken my piano online courses since July 2014 with 231 - 5 Star Reviews

Course Updated: November 15, 2015

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++


Read Music Notes Fast Level 4 - Read 11 Bass Clef Notes with Increasing Speed!


Would you like to increase your sight reading skill in 11 Bass Clef Music Notes?

When it comes to reading Bass Clef notes, I see students struggling & struggling with lots of frustration.

What you need are:

1. A Method that works, thus my Note Attack Method!

2. A method to help you read 11 Music Notes with accuracy! That was in Level 2

3. Now this Level 5 program is to help you increase reading Bass Clef notes with speed.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Listen to what students are experiencing in this class:

By Barbara G

This course will help you learn Bass Clef notes and increase your speed. Using Visual Recognition is the best way to learn. There are many exercises that will help you reach your musical goals. Rosa teaches the Note attack and say it out loud method. Bass Clef is usually the hardest Clef to learn but with this method it becomes doable. Another great course. Thanks Rosa.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As you move from one level to the next, you will be improving with speed like many of my students!

You will move from one speed to the next!

45 BPM - Very Slow

76 BPM – Walking Pace

92 BPM – Moderate Speed

120 BPM – Lively & Fast Speed

200 BPM – For Super Genius

Practice sheets, tests & answer sheets are provided to help you to sight read Bass Clef notes easily!

At the end of this course, you will be able to read Bass Clef notes with breeze!

Students are having lots of fun finding their speed and increasing.

Come on in and join us,

Rosa


***************************************************************************

About Rosa's Piano Online Course:

  • Over 10,000 very happy students already in my classes
  • See the 5 Star Reviews from VERY satisfied students

title: Read Music Notes Fast #4 -Read 11 Bass Clef Notes with Speed
